name: Sweet and Sour Slimes
description:
Welcome to Slimeria!

You've recently ventured to this land in order to fulfill a task given to you by the Adventurer's Guild, and along the way, you happen across something a bit deeper than you imagined!

--

Created for the Slime Jam with Ren'Py!

There are two characters to befriend, and a third to convince of your plans!

There are four endings to find and locate, and your choices matter in your final companions so be careful!

Total Playtime is about 20-40 minutes, depending on reading speed and the time to discover the routes. 

Have fun!
